trans-unit.source: Provides common designer loader functionality that can be used to implement custom workflow designer loaders.
trans-unit.target: Gir vanlig Spørringsutformer laster funksjonaliteten som kan brukes til å implementere egendefinerte arbeidsflyten designer Lasterne.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] Designer loader classes are used to load the designer and save any changes to the state of the designer when the user so instructs.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Spørringsutformer laster klasser som brukes til å laste inn designer og lagre endringer i tilstanden for utformeren når brukeren ber så.

trans-unit.source: The WorkflowDesignerLoader class can be implemented to support custom loading of a workflow designer and workflow designer components.
trans-unit.target: Klassen WorkflowDesignerLoader kan implementeres for å støtte egendefinerte innlasting av en arbeidsflyt designer og arbeidsflyten designer komponenter.

trans-unit.source: A workflow designer loader is also responsible for writing changes to an open document back to the storage the loader used when loading the document after the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.Flush%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: En arbeidsflyt designer laster også er ansvarlig for skriving av endringer i et åpent dokument tilbake til lagring laster når du laster inn dokumentet etter den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.Flush%2A>-metoden.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.Flush%2A>

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Når implementert i en avledet klasse, initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Adds an activity to the designer host after it has been added to the parent activities collection.
trans-unit.target: Legger til en aktivitet designer verten når den er lagt til den overordnede aktiviteter-samlingen.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> to add.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>legge til.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Frigir alle ressursene som brukes av den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Dispose releases all services used by the designer host, but it does not write pending changes to the designer loader.
trans-unit.target: Avhending frigir alle tjenester som brukes av designer verten, men den skrive ikke endringene til designer-laster.

trans-unit.source: If you want to save any pending changes prior to releasing all resources, call <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.Flush%2A> before you call Dispose.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil lagre alle ventende endringer før Frigi alle ressurser, kan du kalle <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.Flush%2A>før du kaller avhending.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.Flush%2A>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the file name of the designer to load.
trans-unit.target: Henter filnavnet for utformeren for å laste inn når overstyres i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the file name of the designer to load.
trans-unit.target: En streng som inneholder navnet på utformeren for å laste inn.

trans-unit.source: Writes pending changes to the location that the designer was loaded from.
trans-unit.target: Skriver ventende endringer til plasseringen designer er lastet inn fra.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, causes <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader"></xref> to reload the designer.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt i en avledet klasse, fører til at <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader"> </xref> på nytt designer.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, retrieves an object that <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader"></xref> uses to read from the specified file.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt i en avledet klasse, henter et objekt som <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader"> </xref> bruker til å lese fra den angitte filen.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains a path to the file to read from.
trans-unit.target: En streng som inneholder en bane til å lese fra filen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.TextReader> to read the specified file.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.IO.TextReader>til å lese den angitte filen.</xref:System.IO.TextReader>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets an object that the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader"></xref> uses to write to the specified file.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt i en avledet klasse, henter et objekt som den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader"> </xref> bruker til å skrive til den angitte filen.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create and return a `TextWriter` object when the GetFileWriter overloaded method is called.
trans-unit.target: Eksemplet nedenfor viser hvordan du oppretter og returnere en `TextWriter` objektet når GetFileWriter overlastet metode kalles.

trans-unit.source: [!code-cs[WF_Samples#34](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/wf_snippets/snippets.cs#34)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#34](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/wf_snippets/snippets.vb#34)]
trans-unit.target: [!code-cs[WF_Samples"](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/wf_snippets/snippets.cs#34)][!code-vb[WF_Samples" ](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/wf_snippets/snippets.vb#34)]

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the path to the file to write to.
trans-unit.target: En streng som inneholder banen til filen til å skrive til.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.TextWriter> to write to the file.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.IO.TextWriter>å skrive til filen.</xref:System.IO.TextWriter>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the workflow should be loaded in debug mode.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om arbeidsflyten skal lastes inn i feilsøkingsmodus.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the workflow should be loaded in debug mode; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis arbeidsflyten skal lastes inn i feilsøkingsmodus; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader"></xref> with any services required by the designer loader host.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader"> </xref> med noen tjenester som kreves av designer laster verten.

trans-unit.source: Applies the serialized layout to the root designer in the current designer host.
trans-unit.target: Gjelder serialiserte oppsettet roten designer i gjeldende designer verten.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> that is created for the serialized layout.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>som er opprettet for serialiserte oppsettet.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: List of errors that occurred during the deserialization.
trans-unit.target: Liste over feil som oppstod under Deserialiseringen.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the specified resource and calls the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.LoadDesignerLayout*> method that applies the serialized layout to the root designer in the current designer host.
trans-unit.target: Henter angitt ressurs og kall av <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.LoadDesignerLayout*>metode som gjelder serialiserte oppsettet for roten designer i gjeldende designer verten.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.LoadDesignerLayout*>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Type> that the resource is associated with.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>at ressursen er knyttet til.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Name of the resource.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på ressursen.

trans-unit.source: Errors encountered during the call to <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.LoadDesignerLayout*>.
trans-unit.target: Feil under kall til <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.LoadDesignerLayout*>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.LoadDesignerLayout*>

trans-unit.source: Called when loading of the designer is completed.
trans-unit.target: Kalles når innlasting av designer er fullført.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if load operation is successful; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis operasjonen er fullført. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Contains the load errors.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder Last Innlastingsfeil.

trans-unit.source: Writes cached changes to the location that the designer was loaded from.
trans-unit.target: Skriver bufrede endringer dit designer ble lastet inn fra.

trans-unit.source: Class that implements the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager"></xref> interface, which manages design-time serialization.
trans-unit.target: Klassen som implementerer den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager"> </xref> grensesnittet som administrerer utformingen serialisering.

trans-unit.source: Loads the designer from a design document.
trans-unit.target: Laster inn designer fra en design-dokument.

trans-unit.source: Class that implements the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager"></xref> interface, which manages design-time serialization.
trans-unit.target: Klassen som implementerer den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager"> </xref> grensesnittet som administrerer utformingen serialisering.

trans-unit.source: Removes an activity from the designer host after it has been added to the parent activities collection.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner en aktivitet fra designer verten etter at det er lagt til den overordnede aktiviteter samlingen.

trans-unit.source: Activity to be removed from the designer.
trans-unit.target: Aktivitet for å bli fjernet fra designer.

trans-unit.source: Serializes the designer layout.
trans-unit.target: Serializes designer oppsettet.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlWriter" name="XmlWriter" href=""></xref> that is used to serialize the layout into.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlWriter" name="XmlWriter" href=""></xref>som brukes til å serialisere oppsettet i.

trans-unit.source: Root activity from which you get the layout information.
trans-unit.target: Root aktiviteten som du får oppsettinformasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Errors encountered during serialization.
trans-unit.target: Feil under serialisering.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor"></xref> metadata of the target [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor"> </xref> metadata for [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor"></xref> metadata of the target [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor"> </xref> metadata for [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
